title: DXGKDDI_VIDPNTARGETMODESET_ACQUIREPINNEDMODEINFO (d3dkmddi.h)
description: The pfnAcquirePinnedModeInfo function returns a descriptor of the pinned mode in a specified VidPN target mode set.
